src:
Dušan Tadić – najbolji napadač holandske lige u poslednjih 30 godina, od Van Bastena se takav nije pojavio
Ako tako kaže bivši napadač Ajaksa...

02 Nov 2019

Čudo od igrača! Nekad su dovoljne brojke, a nekad samo utisak prilikom gledanja prenosa utakmica Eredivizije da mu niko u Holandiji nije ravan. Toliko je odskočio Dušan Tadić za sezonu i po u dresu Ajaksa da pohvale na njegov računu stižu maltene svakodnevno. Hajde što navijači Kopljanika vezu hvalospeve u svom miljeniku, to može da se razume, čak i kad ga Frans fudbal uvrsti na listu od 30 kandidata za Zlatnu loptu deluje da je apsolutno zasluženo posle proćenih izdanja u pohodu do polufinala Lige šampiona, ali kad u zemlji dostrukog viceprvaka sveta skinu kapu i kažu da na njihovm terenima nije viđen bolji napadač u poslednjih 30 godina, to je onda dokaz superiornosti momka iz Bačke Topole.
A oliko ih je niklo na holandskim terenima... Špartao je na njima i Vim Kift, dokazan centarfor, poslednji u nizu koji se poklonio pred majstorstvom srpskog reprezenatativca.„Dušan Tadić je najbolji špic koji se pojavio u holandskom fudbalu od Marka van Bastena. Donijel Malen i Miron Badu ne mogu da donesu PSV-u i AZ Alkmaru ono što trenutno Tadić daje Ajaksu“, piše Kift u kolumni za ugledni De Telegraf.
Podsećanja radi, reč je o čoveku koji je 42 puta nosio dres Lala, igrao za velikane kao što su Ajaks i PSV, dokazao se i u inostranstvu (Torino i Bordo), zbog čega njegova reč ima težinu.„Ako poređate sve napadače Ajaksa od ere Van Bastena do danas onda je Dušan Tadić sigurno najkompletniji. Naravno, ne može da se poredi sa Markom, jer je Van Basten bio brži, fizički jači i igrao je bolje glavom, međutim, način Tadićeve igre u potpunosti je „legao“ fudbalu kakav neguje Ajaks. Dušan omogućava timu iz Amsterdama da igra onako kako bi trebalo“.
Tek da se ne zaboravi, Vim Kift uporedio je Tadića sa čovekom koje je u dresu Ajaksa dao 152 gola na 172 susreta.„Kopljanici poslednjih decenija nisu imali u timu fudbalera kakav je Dušan. Često je sposoban da levom nogom izbaci u napad Donija van de Beka ili da stvori šansu Hakimu Zijehu“.
Ove sezone pojavili su se na holandskim terenima tinejdžeri koji bi u budućnosti mogli da postanu nosioci igre tamošnje reprezentacije, poput Donijela Malena i Mirona Badua, ali...„Imaju i PSV i AZ sjajne napadače, ali niko od njih ne može da se meri sa Tadićem. Badu je totalno drugačiji tip, predator je u kaznenom prostoru, tačno zna gde da se postavi ne bi li sačekao loptu, dok je Malen, zapravo, mešavina Dušana i Malena“, opisao je 56-godišnji Vim Kift.
Za kraju, koja i u brojevima: na 76 utakmica u Ajaksu Dušan Tadić je dao 47 i namestio 36 golova. Da li je potrebno dopisati još nešto?


Pogledajte kako je u rubrici Tiket za vikend tipovao Filip Arsenijević...





FOTO: Reuters
text:
Dusan Tadic - best Dutch striker in the last 30 years, has not appeared since Van Basten
If so says the former Ajax striker ...

02 Nov 2019

A miracle from the players! Sometimes the numbers are enough, and sometimes just the impression when watching the broadcast of the Eredivision matches that no one in the Netherlands is equal to him. Dusan Tadic has bounced so much for the season and a half in Ajax's jersey that the commendations on his account arrive almost daily. Let's put Kopljanik's fans on the bragging rights of their favorite, it can be understood, even when France football lists him on the list of 30 candidates for the Golden Ball, it seems to be absolutely deserved after the run-up to the Champions League semi-final, but when in the country the world 's vice champions take off their cap and say that they have not seen a better striker in their last 30 years, that is a proof of the superiority of the guy from Backa Topola.
Wim Kift, a proven center fielder, was the last one in the series to bow before the Serbian national team. "Dusan Tadic is the best Spitz to appear in Dutch football since Mark van Basten. Donel Malen and Miron Badu cannot bring PSV and AZ Alkmar what Tadic is giving to Ajax right now, "Kift writes in a column for the renowned De Telegraph.
Reminders, this is a man who has worn Lala's jersey 42 times, played for greats such as Ajax and PSV, has proven himself abroad (Turin and Bordeaux), which is why his word carries weight. "If you compare all Ajax strikers from the era Van Basten is by far the most complete then Dusan Tadic. Of course, he cannot compare himself to Mark, because Van Basten was faster, physically stronger and played better with his head, however, the way Tadic's game was completely "laid down" by football, as nurtured by Ajax. Dušan allows the Amsterdam team to play as they should. "
Not to be forgotten, Wim Kift compared Tadic to the man who scored 152 goals in 172 games in Ajax. "In the last decades, the Kopjan players have not had a football team like Dusan. He is often able to throw his left foot into Donny van de Beck's attack or create a chance for Hakim Ziehu. "
This season, teenagers have appeared on Dutch courts, who could become carriers of the national team in the future, such as Donnel Malen and Myron Badu, but ... "They have both PSV and AZ great strikers, but none of them can be measured with Tadic. Badu is a totally different type, the predator is in the penalty area, he knows exactly where to put himself to wait for the ball, while Malen is, in fact, a mix of Dushan and Malen, "described 56-year-old Wim Kift.
In the end, which in numbers: in 76 games in Ajax, Dusan Tadic gave 47 and scored 36 goals. Do you need to write anything else?


Take a look at how the Weekend Ticket typed Filip Arsenijevic ...





PHOTO: Reuters
